name: Chronometry
description:
How to Play:

Use the slider on the bottom of the screen to control time. Unlock the door to progress to the next level.

Description:

This was just a simple prototype to see what a time-travel point-and-click puzzle game would be like. I think it has a lot of promise, but required a lot of work to get just this done. I see why Oracle of Ages only had 2 times to jump between.

Assets

All assets and source code are in the public domain. No credit or attribution required.

Source code:
